mil7.7.8:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘māgavikassa cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.7.8:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena appamiddhena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.7.8:5.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, māgavikassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.7.8:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, māgaviko migesuyeva cittaṃ upanibandhati;
mil7.7.8:6.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ārammaṇesuyeva cittaṃ upanibandhitabbaṃ.
mil7.7.8:6.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, māgavikassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.7.8:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, māgaviko kālaṃ kammassa jānāti;
mil7.7.8:7.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena paṭisallānassa kālo jānitabbo ‘ayaṃ kālo paṭisallānassa, ayaṃ kālo nikkhamanāyā’ti.
mil7.7.8:7.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, māgavikassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.7.8:8.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, māgaviko migaṃ disvā hāsamabhijaneti ‘imaṃ lacchāmī’ti;
mil7.7.8:8.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ārammaṇe abhiramitabbaṃ, hāsamabhijanetabbaṃ ‘uttariṃ visesamadhigacchissāmī’ti.
mil7.7.8:8.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, māgavikassa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
